Description: Ostracon, section of the body of a brown-grey pottery jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a brown-coloured slip and the Register records the presence of faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T36.79 I.34
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393621) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393621)
